author: Deccan
title: Not a copycat: Amit Trivedi
text: Deccan Chronicle | October 16, 2015, 23.19 pm Amit Trivedi A day after we reported the marked similarities between Amit Trivedi’s melody for Nazdeekiyaan from the Shahid Kapoor-Alia Bhatt starrer Shaandaar, and the song Oceans by Coldplay, Amit responded to the controversy. “I swear on my music, I did not copy (the tune),” Amit told us. He further asserted, “I will quit music, if I would ever plagiarise.” While Amit’s musical genius is universally appreciated, previously too, the musician has found himself in the midst of allegations that his Lootera soundtrack was “inspired” from other sources. In the case of Nazdeekiyan, work on it began a few months after Coldplay’s Oceans was launched in June last year. “See, there are seven musical notes, which are used in the entire world. It’s purely a coincidence that my song is similar to this one. I don’t even know about this song.
